lines: A pleasure to meet you─I'm Koji Shirasugi from the Online Business Management Division. You may also have seen me embarrassing myself as Annie...
As part of my duties on the marketing team, I do my best to introduce as many people as possible to the fine MMORPG that is FFXIV.
Together with everyone involved in the making of the FINAL FANTASY XIV channel, it will be our pleasure to continue recruiting the new heroes who are to become your future adventuring companions.
